Posts.Content: Hi Dunbar Sorry to hear about the unlucky news Some specialists only perform some of the options of treatments If your specialist doesn't offer all treatments - It may be worthwhile asking them for a referral to others who 1. Offers radical prostatectomy 2. Offers robotic prostatectomy 3. Performs seed implants 4. Performs radiation tretatment - radiation Oncologist "Prostate cancer research institute" have a lot of online advise including algorithmic driven choices
Posts.Title: So I got PCa - now what?
